headline: Celebrity Trivia: Which Celebs Reconciled With Their Exes Post-Split?
short descr: Kobe and Vanessa Bryant's courtside kiss Tuesday got us thinking about other celebrity couples who split up, only to find
image_caption(s): QUESTION: Balthazar Getty said his wife was "understanding" enough to reconcile with him after his affair with which British actress?
article: Kobe and Vanessa Bryant's courtside kiss Tuesday got us thinking about other celebrity couples who split up, only to find their way back into each other's arms. If the NBA star and his wife do decide to reconcile, they certainly won't be the first star pair to do so. From the screen siren who re-tied the knot in a secret African ceremony to the supermodel whose surprise peace offering put an end to her split, celebrities don't seem to shy away from giving their exes another shot. (Now us non-celebrities, that's a different story.) How much do you know about these reuniting celebrity pairs? Take the quiz below to see how your knowledge of celebrity splits stacks up.
